body:
Over 41 joke replies... decided to archive old one and make a new one. Don't post if you're going to spam.

Anything regarding lovey stuff can be posted in this thread. Directed mainly toward IRL relationships and other miscellaneous things classified under relationships such as advice, information, updates, or anything of the likes can be posted here. I ask that you be appropriate and be serious.

title: The Relationship Thread

replies.body: Relationships are based on happiness, and love. Why does this have to be serious if it's about something fun?
replies.body_tagged: Relationships are based on happiness, and love. Why does this have to be serious if it's about something fun?

replies.body: I say this because the other thread just had #rase and other people who kept spamming about their "Aviloves" which isn't an actual relationship that I made the thread for.
replies.body_tagged: I say this because the other thread just had #rase and other people who kept spamming about their "Aviloves" which isn't an actual relationship that I made the thread for.

reply_to.body: Relationships are based on happiness, and love. Why does this have to be serious if it's about something fun?

replies.body: Just saying, internet relationships are not IRL relationships.
replies.body_tagged: Just saying, internet relationships are not IRL relationships.
